subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Fastnet Race (Sailing)
Maritime Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Four years after the keel disaster in the Celtic Sea, sailors of Rambler 100 are back in the Fastnet Race with a new, smaller yacht, Rambler 88, and with lessons learned.
snippet: Four years after the keel disaster in the Celtic Sea, sailors of Rambler 100 are back in the Fastnet Race with a new, smaller yacht, Rambler 88, and with lessons learned.
